description:
Are you frustrated by your WordPress website?

Have you ever wanted to make a few changes but have not known how or been afraid of getting it all wrong?

Are you paying someone else to do simple tweaks that you could be doing yourself?

WordPress can look daunting at first, but once you know the essentials you'll be surprised at what you can do, even if you aren't that good with technology.

The thing is that you don't want to spend hours flipping through a huge manual to find the small part you need to know. Who has the time for that?

Here's what do you need.

You need a step-by-step guide to just the basics that you need right now. One that gives you a video demonstration of every step and not just a long list of printed instructions.

In this course you'll discover

How to write and publish a post.

How to add a new page to your site

How to change the design and layout of your site using themes and widgets

How to install plugins (and why you need to)

How to make changes to your menus

and more

So don't waste another second of your precious time.

Join the course today!
title: How to create a successful WordPress Site
